reviewText: This documentary that features the music of Cuba beats its way through the entire process by which the world renowned Cuban cigar is produced from seedling to final boxed cigars. This is an education but also a great musical experience. If you love Afro-Cuban Jazz and modern Latin fusion beats this is a beautiful ride.
DVD is from early 1990s. The music is great but cigar part is disappointing.  4 stars for music. 1 star for cigar portion. CAOs movie From Seed To Soul is much better.
Great performance for Cuba's, Carribs and Latin fans !!!  Whan you are fan, you must have it.
